evidence.text: Brief / Memorandum in Support re 146 MOTION to Compel . filed by Melissa Adams, Williest Bandy, Adrainne Johnson, Brianna Morgan, Damian Stinnie.
NOTICE of Appearance by David L. Heilberg on behalf of Naacp (Heilberg, David)
NOTICE of Appearance by Adam John Yost on behalf of Richard D. Holcomb (Yost, Adam)
Plaintiff Damian Stinnie is a 24-year-old African American man who lives in Charlottesville, Virginia. Mr. Stinnie is indigent within the meaning of Va. Code § 19.2-159.
